1825924.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.) If this card's battle position is changed: Banish 1 card in your hand; banish this card, and if you do, the next time this turn your opponent activates a card or effect, negate that activation. You can discard this card; banish 1 "Kugutsu" monster from your Deck. Cannot be banished from the field or GY except by an activated card or effect.
1825924.name: Kugutsu Puppet Flair

1825934.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.) If this card's battle position is changed: Banish 1 card in your hand, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish this card, and if you do, banish it. You can discard this card; banish 1 "Kugutsu" monster from your Deck. Cannot be banished from the field or GY except by an activated card or effect.
1825934.name: Kugutsu Puppet Frenzy

1825953.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.) If this card's battle position is changed: Banish 1 card in your hand; banish this card, and if you do, destroy 1 monster on the field. You can discard this card; banish 1 "Kugutsu" monster from your Deck. Cannot be banished from the field or GY except by an activated card or effect.

If this card's battle position is changed: Banish this card and 1 card in your hand; send 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field to the GY. You can discard this card; banish 1 "Kugutsu" monster from your Deck. Cannot be banished from the field or GY except by an activated card or effect.

1825914.effect: (This monster's original Type is treated as Yokai rather than Zombie.) You cannot Special Summon more than 1 monster from your GY with this effect. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Dexk the turn you activate this effect. 5839.effect: Banish 1 Level 7 monster from your hand or face-up from your side of the field; draw 2 cards. You can only activate 1 "Sacred Sword of Seven Stars" per turn.

1831175.effect:
Once per turn, if you activate a "Kuuroma" Normal Trap, you can make 1 player unaffected by that card's effect. If you control no monsters, or if all monsters you control are "Kuuroma" monsters (min. 1): You can activate 1 of the following effects, but you cannot Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Kuuroma" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Kuuroma - "Insular Introspection"" once per turn.
● Special Summon 1 "Kuuroma" monster from your Deck or GY.
● Add 1 "Kuuroma" Trap from your Deck or GY to your hand.
1831175.name: Kuuroma - "Insular Introspection"

1831213.effect:
1 "Kuuroma" monster
You cannot Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn after this card is Summoned. (Quick Effect): You can move 1 monster your opponent controls to a zone this card points to, and if you do, change this card's Attribute to that monster's current Attribute until the end of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Kuuroma - Aesthetic Ascetic" once per turn. Monsters this card points to have their ATK/DEF become 1000, also if you control at least 2 "Kuuroma" monsters (and no other monsters), their effects are negated.
1831213.name: Kuuroma - "Aesthetic Ascetic"

1830490.effect: Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Machine/WATER/Level 6/ATK 1200/DEF 1800). (This card is also still a Trap). You can banish this card from your GY; the ATK and DEF of 1 monster your opponent controls becomes 0 until the End Phase. You cannot Special Summon monsters from your hand, Deck, or GY the turn you activate this effect, except "Contraption" monsters. You can only activate each effect of "Elemental Contraption: Glaciale" once per turn.

1830492.effect: Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Machine/LIGHT/Level 6/ATK 1400/DEF 1600). (This card is also still a Trap). You can banish this card from your GY; banish 1 card from your Deck that has the word "Trap" listed in its text, and if you do, during the second Standby Phase after this card's activation, add that banished card to your hand. You cannot Special Summon monsters from your hand, Deck, or GY the turn you activate this effect, except "Contraption" monsters. You can only activate each effect of "Elemental Contraption: Luminoso" once per turn.

1830486.effect: Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Machine/FIRE/Level 6/ATK 1800/DEF 1200). (This card is also still a Trap). You can banish this card from your GY to target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only activate each effect of "Elemental Contraption: Cocente" once per turn.
1830486.name: Elemental Contraption: Cocente

1830483.effect: Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Machine/DARK/Level 6/ATK 1600/DEF 1400). (This card is also still a Trap). You can banish this card from your GY; banish 1 card from your opponent's GY. You cannot Special Summon monsters from your hand, Deck, or GY the turn you activate this effect, except "Contraption" monsters. You can only activate each effect of "Elemental Contraption: Caotico" once per turn.

1829991.effect: 2 Level 6 "Contraption" monstersIf this card was Xyz Summoned using only Trap Cards as material: You can add 1 "Contraption" Trap Card that is banished or in your GY to your hand. You can detach 1 material from this card to target 1 monster you control; it can attack directly this turn, but all battle damage dealt to your opponent with that monster is halved. During the End Phase, if a "Contraption" monster other than this card dealt battle damage this turn: You can Set 1 banished Trap Card to your Spell & Trap Zone. You can only activate each effect of "Soaring Contraption Mastro Libero" once per turn.
1829991.name: Soaring Contraption: Mastro Libero

1830447.effect: Cannot be Fusion Summoned. Can only be Special Summoned during the turn a "Contraption" monster's effect was activated in the hand, by Tributing 1 Trap Card in the Monster Zone. During the Main Phase: You can activate 1 of the following effects.● Activate 1 "Contraption" Trap Card from your hand.● Target 1 "Elemental Contraption" card in your GY; Set it to your field. If that card would leave the field, banish it instead.You can only activate this effect of "Shining Contraption: Mastro Radiante" once per turn.
1830447.name: Shining Contraption: Mastro Radiante

1830455.effect: Cannot be Fusion Summoned. Can only be Special Summoned during the turn a "Contraption" monster's effect was activated in the hand, by Tributing 1 Trap Card in the Monster Zone. During the Main Phase: You can activate 1 of the following effects.● You can target 1 banished "Contraption" Trap Card; return it to the GY.● You can target 1 "Elemental Contraption" Card that is banished; Set it to your field. If that card would leave the field, shuffle it into the Deck instead.You can only activate this effect of "Sinister Contraption: Mastro Tetro" once per turn.

1830478.effect: 2 Machine monsters, including a Trap Card in the Monster Zone.(Quick Effect) You can target 1 "Contraption" card you control; it is unaffected by your opponent's card effects until the End Phase of this turn. If this card points to 2 "Contraption" monsters that were Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, you can target up to 2 "Contraption" cards with this effect instead. If this card leaves the field: You can add 1 banished card to your hand. You can only activate each effect of "Defensive Contraption: Mastro Ferreo" once per turn.

1824123.effect: If you control a "World Reaper" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Peacekeeper" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "World Reaper" monsters.

1826016.effect: You can target 1 "World Reaper" monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position, but its effects are negated. You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Young Lord" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "World Reaper" monsters.
1826016.name: World Reaper Young Lord

1824117.effect: If you control no monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: Add 1 "World Reaper" card from your Deck to your hand. This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a Level 8 "World Reaper" monster. You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Swordsman" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "World Reaper" monsters.
1824117.name: World Reaper Swordsman

1825911.effect: You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "World Reaper" monsters. 1824289.effect: You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "World Reaper" monsters. 1825922.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned from your hand or GY by Tributing up to 4 "World Reaper" monsters you control (min 2). You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "World Reaper" monsters. This monster gains effects based on the amount of monsters Tributed for its Tribute Summon.● 2: You can use Equip Cards you control as Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a "World Reaper" monster.● 3: If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can equip 1 card your opponent controls to this card.● 4: Cannot be destroyed by card effects. You can send 1 Equip Card you control to the GY, then target 1 card on the field; banish it.You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Comet Creator" once per turn.

1825852.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned from your hand or GY by Tributing up to 4 "World Reaper" monsters you control (min 2). If this card destroys an opponents monster by battle: You can Special Summon 1 monster equipped to this card to your side of the field.You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Galaxy Destroyer" once per turn.

1826041.effect: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "World Reaper" monster from your hand or GY, and if you do, it can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a "World Reaper" monster. You can banish this card from your GY and shuffle 1 Level 8 or higher "World Reaper" monster from your hand into the Deck;add 1 Level 8 or higher "World Reaper" monster from your Deck to your hand, with a different name than that shuffled monster, but it cannot be Summoned this turn. You can only use each effect of "Overlook from the World Reapers" once per turn.
1826041.name: Overlook from the World Reapers

1824397.effect: If this card is activated: Add 1 "World Reaper" monster from your Deck to your hand. During your Main Phase, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "World Reaper" monster. The first time your Tribute Summoned "World Reaper" monster would be destroyed each turn, it is not. You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Void" once per turn.
1824397.name: World Reaper Void

1825887.effect: You can target 1 "World Reaper" monster you control; it can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a "World Reaper" monster this turn. If you Tribute Summon a "World Reaper" monster: You can target 1 card in either GY; equip it to that Tribute Summoned monster. If your "World Reaper" monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can equip that destroyed monster to 1 "World Reaper" monster you control as an Equip Card. You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Gate" once per turn.
1825887.name: World Reaper Gate

1826296.effect: 2 Level 12 "World Reaper" monsters Tribute Summoned using 3+ TributesYou can detach any number of materials from this card, then target that many cards your opponent controls; attach them to this card as material. If you would Tribute a monster(s) for the Tribute Summon of a "World Reaper" monsters, you can detach materials from this card, equal to the number of monsters you would Tribute instead. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Attach that card to this card as material. You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Divine Judgement" once per turn.
1826296.name: World Reaper Divine Judgement

1507755.effect:
If your opponent controls a Special Summoned monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Tagteamer Devil Heel(s)" once per turn. You can only use 1 of the following "Tagteamer Devil Heel" effects per turn, and once that turn.
● If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, and you control no other monsters: You can add to your hand or send to your GY, 1 "Tagteamer" Spell from your Deck. You cannot declare an attack the turn you activate this effect.
● During damage calculation, if your "Tagteamer" monster battles an opponent's monster: You can have all "Tagteamer" monsters you control gain ATK equal to the number of "Tagteamer" monsters you control x200.
1507755.name: Tagteamer Devil Heel

1507767.effect:
If your opponent controls a Special Summoned monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Tagteamer Dual Chop(s)" once per turn You can only use 1 of the following "Tagteamer Dual Chop" effects per turn, and once that turn.
● If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, and you control no other monsters: You can add to your hand or send to your GY, 1 "Tagteamer" Trap from your Deck. You cannot declare an attack the turn you activate this effect.
● During damage calculation, if your "Tagteamer" monster battles an opponent's monster: You can have all "Tagteamer" monsters you control gain ATK equal to the number of "Tagteamer" monsters you control x400.
1507767.name: Tagteamer Dual Chop

1507750.effect:
If your opponent controls a Special Summoned monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Tagteamer Stunt Double(s)" once per turn. You can only use 1 of the following "Tagteamer Stunt Double" effects per turn, and once that turn.
● If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, and you control no other monsters: You can discard 1 card, and if you do, Set 1 "Tagteamer" Spell/Trap from directly from your Deck.
● During damage calculation, if your "Tagteamer" monster battles an opponent's monster: You can have all "Tagteamer" monsters you control gain ATK equal to the number of "Tagteamer" monsters you control x100.
1507750.name: Tagteamer Stunt Double

1507762.effect:
If your opponent controls a Special Summoned monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Tagteamer Truant Giu(s)" once per turn You can only use 1 of the following "Tagteamer Truant Giu" effects per turn, and once that turn. 
● If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, and you control no other monsters: You can add to your hand or send to your GY, 1 "Tagteamer" monster from your Deck, except "Tagteamer Truant Giu". You cannot declare an attack the turn you activate this effect.
● During damage calculation, if your "Tagteamer" monster battles an opponent's monster: You can have all "Tagteamer" monsters you control gain ATK equal to the number of "Tagteamer" monsters you control x300.
1507762.name: Tagteamer Truant Giu

1507779.effect:
(This card's name is always treated as "Tagteamer Ring"). 
 During your opponent's turn, you can only activate 2 Spell/Trap Cards or effects. You can only control "Tagteamer" monsters. Send all other monsters you control to the GY. All monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF for each monster you control. Any battle damage "Tagteamer Twin Terrors" inflicts to your opponent is doubled. Once per turn, during your Main Phase 1: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your Deck in Attack Position, then end the Main Phase.
1507779.name: Tagteamer Battle Royale

1507809.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects.
● If you control no monsters or exactly 1 monster: You can add 1 "Tagteamer" monster from your Deck to your hand.
● Special Summon 1 "Tagteamer" monster from your hand, then, until the end of the next turn, "Tagteamer" monsters you control in Attack Position, cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects while you control 2 or more "Tagteamer" monsters.
You can only activate 1 "Tagteamer Planning" per turn.
1507809.name: Tagteamer Planning

1507781.effect:
(This card's name is always treated as "Tagteamer Ring"). 
You can only control 1 monster. Send all other monsters you control to the GY. A "Tagteamer" monster you control gains 100 ATK/DEF for each "Tagteamer" card in your GY. During your opponent's turn while you control "Tagteamer Ring Champ", your opponent cannot target it or this card with card effects. While you control a "Tagteamer" monster, draw 2 cards instead of 1 for your normal draw during your Draw Phase.
1507781.name: Tagteamer Solos Ring

1507785.effect: Send 1 other "Tagteamer" card from your hand or field to the GY, then, Special Summon 1 "Tagteamer" monster from your Deck, and double its ATK, also during the End Phase, if that monster you control did not declare an Attack this turn, your LP becomes 100. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Tagteamer" monster from your GY, also during the End Phase, if that monster did not declare an Attack this turn, your LP becomes 100. You can only use each effect of "Tagteamer Tag-In" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Tagteamer" monsters.
1507785.name: Tagteamer Tag-In

1507794.effect: If you control a "Tagteamer" monster: You can target 1 Set card on the field; destroy it, and if you control exactly 1 monster, you can add 1 "Tagteamer" card with a different name than all cards you control from your Deck to your hand. If you control a "Tagteamer" monster: You can banish this card from your GY; send 1 "Tagteamer" card from your Deck to your GY. You can only use 1 "Tagteamer Intent" effect per turn and only once that turn.
1507794.name: Tagteamer Intent

1507788.effect: If you control a "Tagteamer" monster: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; negate its effects until the end of this turn. You can banish this card from your GY; Double the original ATK of 1 non-Link "Tagteamer" monster you control until the End Phase, also during the End Phase, send 1 card from your hand or field to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Tagteamer Tag-Out" once per turn.
1507788.name: Tagteamer Tag-Out

1507797.effect: If you control a "Tagteamer" monster: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy it, and if you control exactly 1 monster, you can banish 1 card from either GY. If you control a "Tagteamer" monster: You can banish this card from your GY; for the rest of this turn, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects during each Battle Phase this turn. You can only use 1 "Tagteamer Whirlwind" effect per turn and only once that turn.
1507797.name: Tagteamer Whirlwind

1507771.effect:
1 non-Link "Tagteamer" monster
This card gains ATK equal to half the ATK of the monster used as material for its Link Summon had on the field. You can only control 1 monster. Each time a Spell/Trap card or effect is activated, this card gains 200 ATK immediately after it resolves. You can only use each of the following effects of "Tagteamer Ring Champ" once per turn.
● If this card is Link Summoned: For the rest of this Duel, you cannot Special Summon "Tagteamer Twin Terrors", also draw 1 card.
● During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was Link Summoned: You can Set 1 "Tagteamer" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck, but it cannot be activated this turn, except "Tagteamer Ring".
1507771.name: Tagteamer Ring Champ

1507775.effect:
2 non-Link "Tagteamer" monsters
You cannot activate the effects of monsters on the field, except "Tagteamer" monsters. Each time a monster(s) is Summoned OR a monster effect is activated, except "Tagteamer Twin Terrors", this card gains 300 ATK immediately after it resolves. You can only use each of the following effects of "Tagteamer Twin Terrors" once per turn.
● If this card is Link Summoned: Target 1 other card on the field; for the rest of this Duel, you cannot Special Summon "Tagteamer Ring Champ", also send the target to the GY.
● During your Main Phase: You can add to your hand or Special Summon, 1 "Tagteamer" monster from your Deck. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Tagteamer" monsters.
1507775.name: Tagteamer Twin Terrors

42021.effect: When this card attacks, during the Damage Step: This card gains ATK equal to the total combined ATK of all other "Gravitron" monsters you control. If another "Gravitron" monster has declared an attack this turn, this card cannot declare an attack this turn. When a "Gravitron" monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field.

You can only use this effect of "Gravitron - Phobos" once per turn.

42122.effect:
You do not take battle damage from battles involving a "Gravitron" monster(s) you control. The first time each "Gravitron" monster you control would be destroyed by card effect each turn, it is not destroyed. Once per turn: you can roll a die, and, based on the result, add 1 "Gravitron" monster from your Deck to your hand with the corresponding Attribute.
1: LIGHT
2: DARK
3: WIND
4: WATER
5: FIRE
6: EARTH
42122.name: Gravitron Alignment

42084.effect: If you control 2 "Gravitron" cards in your Pendulum Zones, your Pendulum Summon cannot be negated, also your opponent cannot activate Spells/Traps or monster effects in response to your Pendulum Summon. You can add 1 face-up "Gravitron" monster from your Extra Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Gravitron Assimilation" once per turn.
42084.name: Gravitron Assimilation

220293.effect: If you control no monsters: You can Special Summon 2 "Gravitron" monsters from your Deck, but their effects are negated and they cannot attack, also you cannot Summon monsters for the rest of the turn, except "Gravitron" monsters. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon up to 2 "Gravitron" monsters from your face-up Extra Deck. You can only use 1 "Gravitron Arrival" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
220293.name: Gravitron Arrival

1821254.effect: If you control 2 "Gravitron" cards in your Pendulum Zones: Target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; negate its effects, then destroy it. If you control a "Gravitron" monster: You can banish this card from your GY and target 1 monster your opponent controls; its ATK becomes 0 until the end of this turn. You can only use 1 "Gravitron Abduction" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1821254.name: Gravitron Abduction

226711.effect:
1 "Gravitron" monster
When this card attacks, during the Damage Step: It gains ATK equal to the total combined ATK of all other "Gravitron" monsters you control. If another "Gravitron" monster has declared an attack this turn, this card cannot declare an attack this turn. During your turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up card on the field; negate its effects. You can only use this effect of "Gravitron - Charon" once per turn.
226711.name: Gravitron - Charon

42065.effect:
3 "Gravitron" monsters
This card cannot declare an attack, also it cannot be targeted for attacks, also if you control no other monsters, your opponent can attack directly. If your opponent activates a card or effect that targets a "Gravitron" card(s) you control (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect and destroy that card. If this card leaves the field by your opponent's card effect: You can target up to 3 face-up "Gravitron" monsters in your Extra Deck; add them to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Gravitron Luna" once per turn.
42065.name: Gravitron - Luna

900020.effect: If this card is Summoned: You can reveal the top 2 cards of your opponents Deck, then you can shuffle their Deck. During your Main Phase: You can send this card from your hand or field to the GY; send 1 "Misbah" monster from your Deck to the GY.
900020.name: Misbah - Dancer of Swiftness

897896.effect: You can discard this card; add 1 "Misbah - Jannah Summon" from your Deck to the hand. If "Misbah - Sha" leaves the field by your opponent's card effect: You can add this card from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Misbah - Lamp Adquirer" once per turn.
897896.name: Misbah - Lamp Adquirer

914095.effect:
If this card is Summoned, you can activate 1 of the following effects: 
●Special Summon 1 "Misbah" monster from your hand. 
●Special Summon 1 "Misbah - Dancer" monster from your GY.
During your Main Phase: You can pay 500 LP, then declare 1 "Misbah" card name; excavate the top card of your Deck, and if it is the declared card, add it to your hand, otherwise shuffle it into the Deck.
914095.name: Misbah - Lullaby of Grace

899556.effect: You can discard this card and 1 "Misbah" monster , except "Misbah - Merchant"; add 1 "Misbah" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If this card is Summoned: You can banish the top 2 cards of your opponent's Deck. If you reveal a card from your opponent's top Deck this turn, you can shuffle 1 of the cards banished by this card effect and treat the revealed card type (Monster, Spell, Trap) as the shuffled card type (even if this card leaves the field). You can only use each effect of "Misbah - Merchant" once per turn.
899556.name: Misbah - Merchant

900714.effect: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand or GY) by Tributing 1 "Misbah" Link Monster. If this card destroys a monster by battle: You can draw 1 card. If your opponent Special Summons a monster: You can negate its effects. You can only use each effect of "Misbah - Sha" once per turn.
900714.name: Misbah - Sha

899935.effect: The third Sha has ascended to the throne after the Second Oasis of Majba Dissapeared. She'll never forgive what the Sha did to the last Ruinoj ruins in that Oasis.
899935.name: Misbah - Dancer of Treason

885687.effect: If you control no monsters or if all monsters you control are "Misbah" monsters (min. 1): Pay 1000 LP; Special Summon 1 "Mishba - Dancer" monster from your Deck. You cannot Special Summon monster from the Extra Deck, except "Misbah" monsters. You can banish this card from the GY, then target 1 "Misbah - Dancer of Treason" you control and 1 monster you opponent controls; switch control of both monsters. You cannot activate monster effects during the turn this effect is activated. You can only use each effect of "Misbah - Cost Of Treason" once per turn.
885687.name: Misbah - Cost Of Treason

1828982.effect: If you control a Misbah monster: At the Start of the next Battle Phase, Special Summon 1 "Misbah - Jannah" monster from your Extra Deck, but return it at the end of that Battle Phase.
1828982.name: Misbah - Jannah Summon

917971.effect:
Activate 1 of the following effects
● Tribute 1 "Misbah" monster, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
●Tribute 1 "Misbah" Link Monster; Special Summon 1 "Misbah" Link Monster from your Extra Deck. 
During the Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can shuffle 1 "Misbah" Link Monster from your GY into the Extra Deck; shuffle this card from the GY into the Deck. You can only activate 1"Misbah's Last Oasis Pursuit" per turn.
917971.name: Misbah's Last Oasis Pursuit

885294.effect:
Activate 1 of the following effects, or, if you control "Misbah - Sha", you can activate up to 2 of these effects instead.
● Discard 1 card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; place it on the top of the Deck.
● Monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle, also all damage you take this turn is halved.
885294.name: Misbah - Spiritual Snare

899517.effect: Must be Special Summoned by the effect of "Misbah - The Jaanah Lamp". If this card is Summoned during your turn: You can target 1 face-up card on the field, and declare a type(Monster, Spell, Trap); reveal the top 2 cards of your opponent's Deck, and if there is a card of the declared type between them, place that target on the top of the Deck. This card inflicts piercing damage. You can only Special Summon "Misbah - Jaanah of Rage" once per turn.
899517.name: Misbah - Jaanah of Rage

897966.effect: Must be Special Summoned by the effect of "Misbah - Jaanah Summon". If this card is Summoned: You can reveal the top 3 cards of your opponents deck, and if you do return them in the same order, then you can shuffle your opponent's Deck. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster on the field and declare 1 card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap); reveal the top 2 cards of your opponent's Deck, and if there is a card of the declared type between them, that target ATK/DEF become 0, also negate its effects during this turn. You can only Special Summon 1 "Misbah - Jannah of Peace".
897966.name: Misbah - Jannah of Peace

914080.effect:
1 "Misbah" monster and 1 monster owned by the opponent
If this card is Link Summoned: You can activate 1 of the following effects:
●Pay 1500 LP;Target 1 1 Level 4 or lower monster in your opponent's GY; Special Summon it, but banish it when it leaves the field, also for the rest of this turn you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "Misbah" monsters.
●You can target 1 Spell in your opponent's GY; Banish it .During the Main Phase of your next turn, you can activate the effect of that banished Spell (even if you no longer control this face-up card).
While this card is in the GY, banish any monster destroyed by battle with any "Misbah" monster. You can only use each effect of "Misbah - Royal G"uard" once per turn.
914080.name: Misbah - Bandit

914292.effect:
2+ Monsters, including 1 "Misbah" monster, except Tokens.
If an attack is declared involving this card and an opponen's monster: You can reveal the top card from your opponent's Deck, and if it is a monster, monsters cannot be destroyed by that battle. If your opponent Special Summons a monster: You can reveal the top card from your opponent's Deck, and if it is a monster, banish the Summoned monster until the End Phase, also after that shuffle your opponents Deck. You can only use each effect of "Misbah - Royal Guard" once per turn. "Misbah - Sha" can attack twice during each Battle Phase, but if IT does halve the damage your opponent takes for the rest of this turn.
914292.name: Misbah - Blind Mystic

900737.effect:
2 "Misbah" monsters
If this card is Summoned: You can declare 1 card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap); reveal the top card of your opponent's Deck, and if you do, and it was the declared type your opponent discards 1 random card from their hand, also, after that, shuffle your opponent's Deck. While this card is in the GY: "Misbah - Sha" gain 500 ATK and cannot be destroyed by card effects. You can only use each effect of "Misbah - Desert Soldier" once per turn.
900737.name: Misbah - Desert Soldier

900753.effect:
2 "Misbah" monsters
If this card is Summoned: You can declare 1 card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap); reveal the top card of your opponent's Deck, and if you do, and it was the declared type you can Set(if it is a Spell/Trap) or Summon if it is a monster, also, after that, shuffle your opponent's Deck. . While this card is in the GY: "Misbah - Sha" gain 500 ATK and cannot be destroyed by card effects. You can only use each effect of "Misbah - Royal Guard" once per turn.
900753.name: Misbah - Royal Guard
